general_advisory: Top dressing of fertilizer is going on. Harvesting of maize crop has started. Sugarcane is at grand growth stage. Cotton. Overall crop condition is normal.

advisory: False smut: False smut disease may be seen in paddy field. To manage the same, spray Propiconazole or Hexaconazole @ 100 ml or Copper oxychloride @ 250 g in 200 lt of water per acre.
Neck Blast: To control Neck Blast diseases first drain out excess water from the paddy field. Spray Hexaconazole ml/acre or Azoxystrobin+ Difenoconazole @ 200

Pod Borer Management: There are chances of Pod borer infestation in black gram and green gram crop. To manage Bihar hairy caterpillar in green gram and black gram crop spray Emamectin Benzoate 5% SG @ 80 18.5 % SC @80
Pre-sowing stage: Before sowing of seeds, seed treatment should be done with Carbendazim 50% WP @ 2 Carboxin 37.5% + Thiram
Fruiting and Harvesting: To manage the infestation of Fruit flies, spray Malathion @ 1 ml/lt.
To control the Powdery mildew disease in the crop, spray
Flowering/Fruiting: The plants showing wilting symptoms, can be uprooted/destroyed away from the field.
Phomopsis blight: To reduce the Phomopsis blight disease in brinjal, spray Metalaxyl + Mancozeb Zineb 75% WP @ 500 g/acre in 200 litres of water.

Liver fluke infestation in sheep and goats: Liver Fluke is a great enemy of Sheep and Goats. These worms live in their liver and damage the liver. 4 months aged animals are mostly affected. Hide bound edema is found in the lower jaw and finally they die.
